sentences.en: Cracking down, or at least discouraging, heretical beliefs is part of his job.
sentences.cn: 打击, 或者至少说是阻碍异教的信仰,是他的职责.

sentences.en: For economics of relative main trend, psychological economics is a heretical economics.
sentences.cn: 相对主流经济学来说, 心理经济学是一门异端经济学.

sentences.en: For every church is orthodox to itself; to others, erroneous or heretical.
sentences.cn: 因为每个教会都认为自己是正统的; 而别人是谬误或异端.

sentences.en: I made the then heretical suggestion that it might be cheaper to design new machines.
sentences.cn: 我提出了当时被认为是旁门左道的建议，说设计新机器可能更省钱。

sentences.en: In the old days he had hidden a heretical mind beneath an appearance of conformity.
sentences.cn: 在过去,他在服从的外表下面隐藏着异端的思想.

sentences.en: It was oppposed as worthless and even heretical.
sentences.cn: 它被认为是无益甚至邪佞之事.

sentences.en: Many of official doctrines are heretical.
sentences.cn: 许多正式的教义是错误的.

sentences.en: Mr Brown's message is about as heretical as you can get.
sentences.cn: 布朗先生的消息就像你所能接触到的关于异教徒的一样.

sentences.en: The Church regards spirit mediums and people claiming to speak to the dead as heretical.
sentences.cn: 教会将灵媒巫师和自称能和死者交谈的人都视为异端。

sentences.en: The heretical thought would be unpunished, unrepented, out of their reach for ever.
sentences.cn: 异端思想会不受到惩罚, 不得到悔改, 永远不让他们碰到.

trans.tran_en: A belief or action that is heretical is one that most people think is wrong because it disagrees with beliefs that are generally accepted
